The FitnessGram™ Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal. Ding A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound. Ding Remember to run in a straight line, and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, ding..........................................(in other words its good)
If you haven't played this, what are you doing with your life?

i am absolutely in love with every part of this game, it is perfectly made for anyone willing to challenge themselves while also having a great story to accompany them. the mods for this game are unbelievably good. just get this game it is so worth the money
portal
One of the best games of all time

Having completed the original Portal years ago on a console version of The Orange Box, I was hesitant to purchase this title, as I did not have any compatible hardware for a long time. I can safely say that this game holds up very well several years post-release. I found myself equally stumped as I did chuckling to myself.

JOGO MARAVILHOSO, continuação de Portal: Still Alive vem com dois modos: coop e solo. Ambos maravilhosos. A história é fantástica nos dois. O modo coop tem online e remote play, o que faz poder somente um amigo ter o jogo e 2 jogarem. Gameplay maravilhosa assim como os gráficos que são muito bons! Acho que é o último jogo da Valve que usa a Source Engine 1, pois depois passaram a usar a 2. Bom é isso. maravilhoso e indico.

No esperé que fuese a ser tan... hermoso.
Vale la pena jugar Portal 1 primero. 
Super recomendado.   
No probé el co-op, pero se ve lindo.

La saga Portal en general habla por si sola. A lo largo de los años Valve supo crear juegos más y más innovadores, tanto en mecánicas de juego como en diseño de historias. Y sí que e nota.
Portal 2 se va a quedar en mi corazón como mi primer acercamiento a las mecánicas en los juegos y el efecto de los vectores, la fuerza y la gravedad.
La campaña es excelente y tiene un final adecuado, pero la campaña co-op es aún mas entretenida y promete horas de risas con un amigo.

Portal 2, is one of the best games. I have ever played, It's one of those games I can pick up and play. The only thing that bugs me, is all the "Memes" that are in the game. Most of these jokes get ruined by the playerbase. if you get away from the memes of Portal, you can see how Valve put love and care inside this masterpiece.

This is, unequivocally, my favorite video game of all time. The tutorial is done extremely well, the art style just *fits*, the story is wonderfully written, and every single joke lands, even in the more serious tone of the game. If you haven't played this game, pick it up, even if you haven't played the first. Everything will still make sense, I assure you.

every time i glance over at this game in my steam library i black out and come to 10 hours later with the funny blue robot back on my title screen. you think youll only play this game in its entirety once or twice but youre lying to yourself. i have one thing to say for those who open pandoras box and make the dire mistake of picking up a copy of portal 2: may god have mercy on you.

Arkadaşımla Co-op modunda oynamak için almıştık. Bölümleri gerçekten kafa yoruyor. Bu yüzden sohbet edip oynayabileceğiniz güzel bir oyun. Oyunun hoşumuza gitmeyen tek tarafı bittiğinin farkına varamamış olmamız. Bittiğini fark etmek için araştırmamız gerekti o derece yani. Onun haricinde mükemmel vakit geçirdik. Düşünmeden alın.

10x better than the first one, you get to learn more of the story in portal it's also a LOT longer than the original on top of that there is a co-op mode where you can play with your friends to solve tests or play with random strangers! Very fun.
